main.​ XPS_fnc_logError
[_message,_args*] call XPS_fnc_logError
Description

Puts string into rpt file

Parameters
_message

String - message to put in rpt

_args*

Array - (Optional - Default: []) - if supplied, message string will be expected to be same as Format command (with %1, %2, etc..)

Returns
Nothing
Examples
Typical
["Hello"] call XPS_fnc_logError;
Authors

Crashdome
